header.author-notes:

changelog.change: Remove tabs and spaces form portal.js
Fix to search if all forums are private.
Fix to recent topics is all forums are private.
Fix/update adding block to mod pages.
Validation fixes (1) re coded 1 mysql query.
Group select dropdown box, now uses lang values.
Fixed issue when updating phpBB (STARGATE not defined).
ACP (menus): Marked disabled menu items to unallocated.
ACP (menus): Removed 2 remaining head/footer menu options.
Head/Footer menu options will be added in a later revision.
Process some news code if portal disabled.
If portal disabled, load a basic lang file.
Removed header/footer layouts/menus for the moment.
Changed tooltips from hardcoded to admin option.
Changed version from 1.0.0a...z as automod doesn't like characters.
Added: ACP > Reset user block layouts.
Added: Max avatar size to user information block.
Recoded: Kiss Acronyms mod from core.
Removed more HTML parsing from php files...
Replaced hardcoded vars from constants file...
Default logo now uses phpBB logo (in png format, located in the style logo folder)...

Replaced hardcoded vars from constants file...
Default logo now uses phpBB logo (in png format, located in the style logo folder)...
Removed the change width (wide/fixed) icon, code and script...
This will be replaced with a styles mod later...
Removed all phpBB core function duplication
Removed all language edits form phpBB core files.
Rewrite of the original Kiss Portal (2004/5).

action-group.diy-instructions: Go to ACP > PORTAL tab... Under BLOCKS > Manage All Blocks option, click on Re-index blocks button... Set permissions for blocks and menus as desired... (note, permissions are set on a group basis)... Refresh prosilver Templates/Themes/Imagesets... Refresh subsilver2 Templates/Themes/Imagesets... Delete or Rename the portal_install directory...
